resources.string: Tap When You Hear A Beep

Important: Earphones must not have integrated volume control or loudness, equalizers, etc! \n\nCalibration of your earphones must be performed in a quiet place by at least one normally hearing person between the ages of 18 and 35. Once the test begins, you will hear beeps of various pitches and volumes. Every time you hear a beep, simply tap the screen. You can pause / continue with a long click and speed up with a double click.
Simple Calibration: Requires good hearing at 1000 Hz and headphones are linear across the frequency range.
Full Calibration: Extensive tests between 125 Hz and 8000 Hz.
No test results available. Please take a test, then return to this page.

This app can evaluate your hearing capabilities.
First your earphones must be calibrated. 

Important: Earphones must not have integrated volume control or loudness, equalizers, etc! 

You can either perform a full test which requires one or better several persons between the ages of 18 and 35 with normal hearing. Or you can perform a simple calibration at 1000Hz only (assuming good hearing at this frequency). In this case it is assumed that the earphones are linear across the frequency range and calibration values for the other frequencies are then calculated using the ISO226:2003 standard.

Whenever you hear a beep simply touch the screen. You can pause / continue with a long click and speed up with a double click.

If you have several persons available for calibration simply press "Add Calibration" and an average value of existing calibrations will be calculated. You may also delete the whole calibration.

After that you can perform tests and view them in test results.

You can then also perform tests at single frequencies. There you can manually select ear, frequency, and sound amplitude by clicking on the buttons.
Do you like this app? Please star it on GitHub!
Restore Data from Documents folder. Open folder \'Documents\' and select hEARtest.zip if needed!
%s needs access to external storage. Please accept permission and try again.
Please delete file and try again
